LOCAL_MTK_PATH:= vendor/mediatek/proprietary/frameworks/base/voicecommand/cfg/

ifeq ($(strip $(MTK_VOICE_UI_SUPPORT)),yes)
    PRODUCT_COPY_FILES += \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/1/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/1/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/1/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/1/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/1/2.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/1/2.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/1/3.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/1/3.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/2/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/2/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/2/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/2/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/2/2.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/2/2.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/2/3.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/2/3.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/3/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/3/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/3/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/3/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/3/2.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/3/2.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/alarm/3/3.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/alarm/3/3.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/camera/1/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/camera/1/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/camera/1/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/camera/1/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/camera/2/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/camera/2/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/camera/2/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/camera/2/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/camera/3/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/camera/3/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/camera/3/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/camera/3/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/phone/1/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/phone/1/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/phone/1/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/phone/1/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/phone/2/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/phone/2/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/phone/2/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/phone/2/1.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/phone/3/0.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/phone/3/0.ogg:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/command/phone/3/1.ogg:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/command/phone/3/1.ogg:mtk
endif

ifneq ($(strip $(MTK_VOICE_UNLOCK_SUPPORT))_$(strip $(MTK_VOW_SUPPORT)), no_no)
    PRODUCT_COPY_FILES += \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/64.dat:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/64.dat:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/128.dat:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/128.dat:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.f:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.f:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.l:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.l:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.p:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.p:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.t:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.t:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.gen:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/c_e_dic.bin.gen:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/commandfilr3.dic:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/commandfilr3.dic:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/Model1.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/Model1.bin:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/antiCmds/Model4.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/antiCmds/Model4.bin:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/ubmModel0.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/ubmModel0.bin:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/ubmModel1.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/ubmModel1.bin:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/ubmModel2.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/ubmModel2.bin:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/ubmModel3.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/ubmModel3.bin:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/ubmModel4.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/ubmModel4.bin:mtk \
       $(LOCAL_MTK_PATH)/ubmModel10.bin:$(TARGET_COPY_OUT_VENDOR)/etc/voicecommand/training/ubmfile/ubmModel10.bin:mtk
endif
